thread.title: U.S. forecast to be top global oil producer by 2019

title: U.S. forecast to be top global oil producer by 2019
text:
U.S. forecast to be top global oil producer by 2019 Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 00:53 
The United States will overtake Russia as the world’s biggest oil producer by 2019 at the latest, the International Energy Agency said on Tuesday, as the country’s shale oil boom continues to upend global markets. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The United States will overtake Russia as the world’s biggest oil producer by 2019 at the latest, the International Energy Agency said on Tuesday, as the country’s shale oil boom continues to upend global markets.
